root.name: Gungriffon Blaze
root.description: OverviewGunGriffon Blaze is a mech action game developed by Game Arts and published by Capcom in Japan and Working Designs in the United States. The game is set in the not too distant future with a world divided into rival factions. You take the command of a special unit of mech suits known as AWGS-Class infiltration units. The game puts the player through six different world theaters with adjustable difficulty levels.
